discussion.content:
The correct options for hosting and running a MySQL database on AWS are:
A. Amazon RDS
D. Amazon EC2

Selected Answer: D
Answer is AD

AD
The reason for D is because users can create their own database and run it in EC2.

Selected Answer: A
A. Amazon RDS (Relational Database Service, PaaS)
D. Amazon EC2 (Elastic Compute Cloud, IaaS)

Selected Answer: A
The AWS services that a company can use to host and run a MySQL database are Amazon RDS and Amazon EC2.

Amazon RDS is a fully-managed relational database service that makes it easy to set up, operate, and scale a MySQL database in the cloud.
Amazon EC2 is a compute service that allows you to run your own virtual machines on the AWS Cloud. You can install and configure MySQL on Amazon EC2, but you will be responsible for managing the database.

Selected Answer: A
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/Welcome.html

D https://docs.aws.amazon.com/prescriptive-guidance/latest/patterns/set-up-data-replication-between-amazon-rds-for-mysql-and-mysql-on-amazon-ec2-using-gtid.html
Choose two: A and D

Selected Answer: A
A. Amazon RDS (Relational Database Service)
D. Amazon EC2 (Elastic Compute Cloud)

Selected Answer: B
B, D should be correct answer

questions.question_text:
A company wants a key-value NoSQL database that is fully managed and serverless.

Which AWS service will meet these requirements?

A company is migrating to the AWS Cloud and wants to optimize the use of its current software licenses.

Which AWS services, features, or purchasing options can the company use to meet these requirements? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Answer is BD

DB
ChatGPT can explain you the reason

Selected Answer: B
B. Amazon EC2 Dedicated Hosts
D. AWS License Manager

"Amazon EC2 Dedicated Host is also integrated with AWS License Manager, a service which helps you manage your software licenses, including Microsoft Windows Server and Microsoft SQL Server licenses. In License Manager, you can specify your licensing terms for governing license usage, as well as your Dedicated Host management preferences for host allocation and host capacity utilization."

https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/dedicated-hosts/#:~:text=Amazon%20EC2%20Dedicated%20Host%20is%20also,host%20allocation%20and%20host%20capacity%20utilization.

Selected Answer: D
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/license-manager/latest/userguide/license-manager.html

B&D

https://docs.aws.amazon.com/license-manager/latest/userguide/host-resource-groups.html
choose 2: B and D

Selected Answer: D
B. Amazon EC2 Dedicated Hosts: With Amazon EC2 Dedicated Hosts, you can bring your own software licenses to the AWS Cloud and use them on dedicated physical servers. This allows you to leverage your existing licenses while benefiting from the scalability and flexibility of the cloud.

D. AWS License Manager: AWS License Manager helps you track, manage, and enforce software licenses in the AWS Cloud. It allows you to create licensing rules that align with your software license agreements and manage license usage across multiple AWS accounts. This can help optimize the use of your software licenses and ensure compliance.

Selected Answer: B
B, D
Dedicated Hosts - This pricing model allows you to use your existing application license, which might be based on sockets, cores, or virtual machines (VMs)

License Manager makes it easier for you to manage your software licenses from vendors, such as Microsoft, SAP, Oracle, and IBM, across AWS and your on-premises environments.

Selected Answer: B
B. Savings Plans

"Savings Plans provide savings beyond On-Demand rates in exchange for a commitment of using a specified amount of compute power (measured per hour) for a one or three year period. You can manage your plans by using recommendations, performance reporting, and budget alerts in AWS Cost Explorer."

https://docs.aws.amazon.com/savingsplans/latest/userguide/what-is-savings-plans.html

Selected Answer: B
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/savingsplans/latest/userguide/what-is-savings-plans.html

Savings Plans provide savings beyond On-Demand rates in exchange for a commitment of using a specified amount of compute power (measured per hour) for a one or three year period

Selected Answer: B
B. Savings Plans
Option B- the key is commitment to use

Selected Answer: B
B. Savings Plans

Selected Answer: B
Savings Plans are a flexible model that offers lower prices compared to On-Demand pricing, in exchange for specific usage commitments over a one-year or three-year period.

questions.question_text:
A company seeks cost savings in exchange for a commitment to use a specific amount of an AWS service or category of AWS services for 1 year or 3 years.

Which AWS pricing model or offering will meet these requirements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Security group

"A security group acts as a virtual firewall for your EC2 instances to control incoming and outgoing traffic. Inbound rules control the incoming traffic to your instance, and outbound rules control the outgoing traffic from your instance. When you launch an instance, you can specify one or more security groups. If you don't specify a security group, Amazon EC2 uses the default security group for the VPC. You can add rules to each security group that allow traffic to or from its associated instances. You can modify the rules for a security group at any time. New and modified rules are automatically applied to all instances that are associated with the security group. When Amazon EC2 decides whether to allow traffic to reach an instance, it evaluates all of the rules from all of the security groups that are associated with the instance."

https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-security-groups.html

Selected Answer: B
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-security-groups.html

Which AWS service or feature can the company associate with the EC2 instance to meet this requirement?
